actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to provide authorization for appropriations for the Federal Communications Commission for fiscal years 1976, 1977, and 1978.

summary.text: Authorizes under the Communications Act of 1934 appropriations for the Federal Communications Commission for fiscal years 1976, 1977, and 1978.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to provide authorization for appropriations for the Federal Communications Commission for fiscal years 1976, 1977, and 1978.
